title: Manikyam & Pachala Grand Haaram - Diamond and Gemstone Necklace
materials: Natural Emeralds (Pachala) with excellent color saturation
and Rubies (Manikyam). Gold purity certified by BIS hallmark.
features: A stunning adaptation of the traditional Haaram, this piece features a delicate floral motif throughout. The central pendant showcases an intricately designed cluster of diamonds surrounding a brilliant-cut emerald. The cascading design is further enhanced with emerald drops and ruby accents. Handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad, this necklace showcases a blend of traditional and contemporary design elements. The setting is meticulously done to maximize the brilliance of each diamond and gemstone.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for cultural events (Sankranti
Diwali) and festive occasions. This piece is also a great choice for contemporary formal events
adding a touch of tradition to modern attire.
description: A timeless heirloom piece combining the elegance of diamonds, the vibrancy of emeralds and rubies, and the richness of 22K gold. Handcrafted by award-winning artisans with decades of experience. The design is both traditional and contemporary, making it versatile for various occasions. Features BIS hallmarked gold ensuring its purity and value. This Haaram embodies the cultural heritage and refined craftsmanship of Hyderabad.
